name: Conway's Game Of Life (LyffLyff)
description:
Shortcuts:

  • Start/Stop Sim: B
  • Next Gen: Space
  • Revert to Gen 1: R
  • Clear Grid: C
  • Birth Cell: Mouse Left
  • Kill Cell: Mouse Right

Conway's Game of Life is the worlds most well known, so called cellular automaton. It creates complex patterns by combining simple rules and running them over multiple generations.

This just a simple side project I did within a few days, but still any kind of feedback is greatly appreciated.

Source Code: Github Repo
